title: Give trinity back to everyone instead of trying to make it a marksmen item.
body:
The rest of the markemsn item changes I don't care about, they are fine none of them seem that broken outside of a bit to much crit chance for a few of them but I hate having to rely on luck to even get a shot at the damage I was use too when using trinity after the changes. Yes #crithappens is a really bad reason to win or lose lane and it is extremely RNG when it is only 20% being bought.

And yes this is a downgrade from current rageblade which I know is over the top currently and the only think keeping Irelia and Jax in the game but I want to have a trinity that is worth coming back to before having to come back to it.

Either way, I actually like the new Triforce on champions I buy it on. Jax and Irelia bought it for a mix of stats, which Rageblade provides (and still will provide. Jax is gonna build Rageblade unless it gets gutted), but some other toplaners can buy the item, such as Trundle, Dr. Mundo (its actually great on him, since he cant really buy IBG),  AD Fizz, AD Ekko (a bastardized AD Fizz that may be better now... try it :) ). And its not like Jax and Irelia are barred from the item- they can still get it.

It may be overshadowed by Rageblade in some areas, but its still a good buy on many champions and still fits the "kinda works on everyone" that the item was meant to achive.

Champions reliant on the old Trinity were really hard to balance (sounds strangely familiar ... nah). The components were too gold efficient and completing the item was a huge power spike. Why do you think Irelia was considered an issue?

They should just remove it's crit all together in exchange for attack speed and maybe AD. It benefits both fighters and marksmen. Fighters for obvious reasons, and marksmen because having only 15% attack speed on that item is actually very awkward. If you're building triforce on a marksmen, chances are you're buying infinity edge and essence reaver too. That's 40% crit as is, you don't have room in your build to also get a lifesteal, attack speed item, boots, and armour pen (Unless you're going to go blade of the ruined king, which got gutted and probably shouldn't be bought ever except on the champions that it was core on before). The triforce needs to be that attack speed item.

New Trinity isn't even good for marksmen. The only two champions who appreciate the Trinity changes are {{champion:157}} and {{champion:41}}.

It's no good for Ezreal. He desperately needs the Attack Speed Trinity Force used to provide. Now that it only gives 15% his auto attack DPS is a lot lower, making the added Crit less useful on him. With 0.4 / 0.8 / 0.8 / 0.9 AP ratios, he seriously misses the 30 AP as it increased the damage of his W E R by quite a bit, and added 12 damage to Mystic Shot as well which is a longsword worth of damage.

Cork is focused on Magic DPS now and he too liked the AP on the item. Jax and Irelia also do not itemize for additional crit and preferred the attack speed and AP as well. 

I wouldn't count on Riot reverting their changes because they are literally beyond stubborn but I don't feel anyone at Riot thought the Trinity Force changes through. If they wanted it to be an ADC item why did they nerf the AD and Attack Speed on it AND increase the cost of the item, while introducing RFC and Shiv with more crit and Attack Speed at a far more reasonable price? The only reason Ezreal bothers buying it is because his Mystic Shot is balanced around him having a Sheen item and without Sheen the damage and scaling is pitiful.

Riot for the love of god if you don't change anything else this patch please revert Trinity Force back to the way it was. {{champion:39}}, {{champion:24}}, and {{champion:81}} need this item to be the way it was. There is no fucking way that bastard of a champion {{champion:157}} needed any more itemization catered specifically to him. It's completely outrageous.

Replacing the Zeal with either {{item:1043}} or {{item:3101}} both seem like they would be better options for most of the cast.

If it misses the movespeed too much, just buff the Rage passive a bit.
